manifest_description.message: Encrypt your posts & chats on You-Know-Where. Allow only your friends to decrypt.

additional_post_box__placeholder_w_name.message: Hey $1, what's your mind? Encrypt with Maskbook

additional_post_box__placeholder_wo_name.message: What's your mind? Encrypt with Maskbook

additional_post_box__encrypted_failed.message: Please paste the following text into the post box.

comment_box__paste_failed.message: Please paste it into the comment box.

click_to_setup.message: Click here to setup your Maskbook account!

decrypted_postbox_decrypting_finding_per.message: Maskbook is looking for the public key of the author...

decrypted_postbox_decrypting_finding_pos.message: Maskbook is retrieving the post key to decrypt this post...

welcome_0_description.message: You can post on social networks without allowing them to stalk, analyze, or spy on you.

welcome_0_caption.message: Lost your keypair backup? No worry. Simply start as a new user.

welcome_1a2_title.message: Encrypt message in a Maskbook postbox

welcome_1a2_imgalt.message: Screenshot of how to encrypt message with Maskbook

welcome_1a2_description.message: Then only people you select with Maskbook can see the posted content.

welcome_1a3_description1.message: Our extension is asking you to download your key as a file.

welcome_1a4_auto_radio_aria.message: Choose how to verify your account

welcome_1a4_disabled.message: Sorry, only one automatic verification method is available.

welcome_1a4_type_auto_subtitle1.message: Avoid any confusion before your first encrypted post.

welcome_1a4_type_auto_subtitle2.message: This allows your friends to verify the connection between your social network account and your keypair.

welcome_1a4_type_manual_subtitle1.message: Add this to bio, or post on timeline, before your first encrypted post.

welcome_1a4_type_manual_subtitle2.message: This allows your friends to verify the connection between your social network account and your keypair.

welcome_1b_tabs_text.message: Paste the content of the backup file by yourself

welcome_1b_dragging.message: Drag your key backup into this dialog

welcome_1b_qr_0.message: You can find QR Code by

welcome_1b_qr_1.message: 1. right-click the icon of the Maskbook in the browser address bar

welcome_1b_hint_identity.message: This backup file contains the following accounts:

welcome_1b_hint_network.message: And Maskbook is going to request permissions for these sites:

welcome_1b_qr_error_1.message: There is an error occur during the scanning.

welcome_1b_qr_error_2.message: You may try other ways to restore your account.

banner_collecting_identity.message: Maskbook is identifying how to setup your account...

service_invalid_backup_file.message: This does not seems like Maskbook's backup.

service_not_setup_yet.message: You have not set up Maskbook yet!

service_not_share_target.message: Maskbook does not find the key used to decrypt this post. Maybe this post is not intended to share with you?

service_unknown_payload.message: Unknown post version, maybe you should update Maskbook?

service_have_no_own_key_yet.message: You have no private key yet

automation_request_click_edit_bio_button.message: Please click the "Edit bio" button or the pencil on the bio box.

automation_request_paste_into_bio_box.message: Please copy your public key into the bio box and publish it.

automation_request_paste_into_post_box.message: Please copy your public key and publish it to your timeline!

payload_incomplete.message: This post is not complete, you need to view the full post.

payload_bad.message: This post seemed to be corrupted. Maskbook cannot decrypt it.

payload_throw_in_alpha41.message: Support for Alpha41 is dropped. Tell your friends to upgrade Maskbook!
